title: Update WhatsApp/phone number to 6374942194 across frontend

requirements.summary: Replace all occurrences of phone/WhatsApp number 6374350379 with 6374942194 in shared selector and Contact section tel links, keeping dialing/wa.me values and displayed formatting consistent with +91.
acceptanceCriteria: In PhoneNumberSelector, the entry that previously used +916374350379 / '+91 6374 350 379' is updated to use +916374942194 / '+91 6374 942 194' (or equivalent correct spacing), and selecting it opens the correct tel: or https://wa.me/ link.
In ContactSection, the second phone <a href="tel:..."> link is updated from tel:+916374350379 to tel:+916374942194 and the visible text matches the new number.
No remaining occurrences of '6374350379' exist in frontend source files after the change.

file_operations.description: Update the PHONE_NUMBERS list entry for the second number from +916374350379 / '+91 6374 350 379' to +916374942194 / '+91 6374 942 194', ensuring the selector continues to produce correct tel: and wa.me links based on the updated value.

Update the second phone link in the Contact section from href tel:+916374350379 and display '+91 6374 350 379' to tel:+916374942194 and display '+91 6374 942 194', keeping formatting consistent with other numbers. After changes, verify no remaining '6374350379' literals exist anywhere under frontend/ source files.
